loadImg: Please load only PNG, JP(E)G files less 512kb
login-reload: Please login App or connect WiFi and reload App
modalCenter-text-1:
Welcome! 
 Here we mix Real Life and Digital! We would like to introduce you the MVC architecture pattern on the Real Life Example – Coffee Machine. Or you can relax and drink a digital Coffee :)
modalCenter-text-19:
Finish!
 It’s time to drink a REAL coffee!
modalLeft-text-13: Coffee is ready. You can take it (click on the cup) in the VIEW. Check if you understood the MVC with a Quiz. Good luck!
modalLeft-text-2: So, you have an exclusive coffee machine like Elon Musk, do you? Turn it on.
modalLeft-text-3: Personal account in Coffee Machine? No way! Do you know that Coffee Machine is conceivable as an application divided on 3 parts, like MVC pattern?
modalLeft-text-4: MVC is an architecture pattern which separates logic, UI & database connection of our application. It’s divided into 3 sections: MODEL, VIEW and CONTROLLER.
modalLeft-text-5: Now you (User) interact with VIEW. VIEW is responsible for look and feel of our application (UI components, forms, buttons..).
modalLeft-text-6:
But what’s happened during Logging in? 
1. You filled in the Login form in the VIEW.
2. CONTROLLER verified and sent your data to MODEL. 
3. MODEL updated VIEW and you see your name and picture
modalLeft-text-7: And now let’s make an MVC coffee! Choose a coffee on the screen.
modalLeft-text-answer: Choose the correct element for this step (press "M" for MODEL, "V" for VIEW or "C" for CONTROLLER): You filled in the Login form
modalRightBottom-text-12:
MODEL: 
Grinding coffee beans. Water enters the boiler and heats up.
modalRightBottom-text-5:
MODEL 
stores & manages data and provides data to the VIEW
modalRightTop-text-5:
CONTROLLER 
receives input from VIEW, uses logic to translate the input to a request for the MODEL
modalRightTop-text-9:
CONTROLLER:
Checking water, coffee beans and free space in the waste container…
